changes.change:
NEW FEATURES:
•None

FIXES & IMPROVEMENTS:
•Disabled apps unlock for Apple Pay
•Added ability to blacklist for apps unlock
•Removed vexillarius dependency for <iOS 14

NEW FEATURES:
•None

FIXES & IMPROVEMENTS:
•Added support for more apps unlock. Tested working with Strongbox, Bitwarden, and Termius. Some apps ARE NOT SUPPORTED.

NEW FEATURES:
•None

FIXES & IMPROVEMENTS:
•Fixed banner not dismissing after app unlocked
•Changed apps unlock glyph

NEW FEATURES:
•None

FIXES & IMPROVEMENTS:
•Fixed Apps Unlock not working properly

NEW FEATURES:
•Added ability to unlock apps using Apple Watch (see detailed info in Perseus->Advanced->Unlock Apps

FIXES & IMPROVEMENTS:
•Improved haptic feedback communication with Apple Watch
•Other bug fixes & improvements

NEW FEATURES:
•None

FIXES & IMPROVEMENTS:
•Fixed incorrectly entered passcode being registered as a valid session (thanks to iamalive2008 for bringing this to my attention)

NEW FEATURES:
•None

FIXES & IMPROVEMENTS:
•Internal fixes that you probably don't care

NEW FEATURES:
•None

FIXES & IMPROVEMENTS:
•Fixed banners not presenting if haptic disabled

NEW FEATURES:
•Added banners for iOS 14.x (on by default). Requires vexillarius package
•Added "Fast Unlock" by utilizing RSSI cache (on by default)

FIXES & IMPROVEMENTS:
•Improved reliability
•Significantly improved unlock speed thanks to "Fast Unlock"

NEW FEATURES:
•None

FIXES & IMPROVEMENTS:
•Fixed missing icons in preferences

NEW FEATURES:
•None

FIXES & IMPROVEMENTS:
•Defer unlock to homescreen if siri is active

NEW FEATURES:
•None

FIXES & IMPROVEMENTS:
•Defer unlock to homescreen if camera is active or on widget page

NEW FEATURES:
•None

FIXES & IMPROVEMENTS:
•Compiled arm64e slice for iOS 14

NEW FEATURES:
•Added haptic feedback on AW after successfully authenticated
•Added option to disable FaceID failure vibration


FIXES & IMPROVEMENTS:
•Unlock to homescreen if intended, or stay at lock screen otherwise
•Forbid the creation of token if AW not on wrist
•Other improvements
